name: Tess White
item_text: To ask the Scottish Government whether it will provide an update on student finance for nursing and midwifery students, in light of reported concerns by both the Royal College of Nursing and the Royal College of Midwifery in Scotland regarding the viability of these courses.

name: Tess White
item_text: To ask the Scottish Government what assessment it has made of the reported increase in COVID-19 cases between May and June 2024, and what its position is on whether the uptake of COVID-19 vaccinations during the winter vaccination programme was sufficient.

name: Alexander Stewart
item_text: To ask the Scottish Government what it is doing to tackle any inappropriate care and overcrowding in NHS emergency departments.

name: Brian Whittle
item_text: To ask the Scottish Government what action it is taking to ensure that the provision of midwives by the NHS meets demand.
